task.title: Managing memory size
task.shortdesc: Tuning memory to retain or eject metadata is set when creating or editing the bucket properties.

context.p: To specify the bucket memory size:

step.cmd: Navigate to Data Buckets > Create New Data Bucket (new bucket) or Data Buckets > bucket-info> Edit (existing bucket).
In Memory Size panel, section Cache Metadata, select one of the two radio buttons: Value Ejection or Full Ejection.
step.info:
The Value Ejection ejects only the value while the key and metadata remain in the memory; it requires more memory but provides the best performance.
The Full Ejection ejects everything (value, key, and metadata); it reduces the memory overhead requirements.
